name: Maushold
flavorText: The two little ones just appeared one day. The group might be a family of related Pokémon, but nobody knows for sure.

previous.name: Tandemaus
previous.flavorText: Exhibiting great teamwork, they use their incisors to cut pieces out of any material that might be useful for a nest, then make off with them.

next.name: Fidough
next.flavorText: This Pokémon is smooth and moist to the touch. Yeast in Fidough’s breath induces fermentation in the Pokémon’s vicinity.
